lead_paragraph: Travelers were told to leave two terminals while the police investigated, but no injuries were reported and there was no confirmation that shots had been fired.

headline.print_headline: 2 J.F.K. Terminals Evacuated After Reports of Shots Fired
headline.main: Reports of Gunfire at J.F.K. Airport Prompt Evacuation

snippet: Travelers were told to leave two terminals while the police investigated, but no injuries were reported and there was no confirmation that shots had been fired....
abstract: Two terminals at Kennedy International Airport in Queens are evacuated, and searched, by armed police after reports of shots fired send travelers and airport personnel into panic.
